remarks: Value of the strong sequence builder function.  The set ` W ` represents here the words of length greater than or equal to the lenght of the initial sequence ` M ` .  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 21-Apr-2019.)
statement:
sseqval.1 $e |- ( ph -> S e. _V ) $.
sseqval.2 $e |- ( ph -> M e. Word S ) $.
sseqval.3 $e |- W = ( Word S i^i ( `' # " ( ZZ>= ` ( # ` M ) ) ) ) $.
sseqval.4 $e |- ( ph -> F : W --> S ) $.
sseqval $p |- ( ph -> ( M seqstr F ) = ( M u. ( lastS o. seq ( # ` M ) ( ( x e. _V , y e. _V |-> ( x concat <" ( F ` x ) "> ) ) , ( NN0 X. { ( M concat <" ( F ` M ) "> ) } ) ) ) ) ) $.
$d F x y $.
$d M x y $.
$d ph x y $.
